sen.e: His dairy "Tokinori-ki" exists today, which recorded the situation of Inaba Province when he visited there as its governor in 1099, so the diary is a precious historical source that enables us to know about things at that time, such as the activities of "Zuryo" (the head of the provincial governors) & the circumstances of Inaba Province.
